mutants.code:
def is_substring(s1, s2):
    s1 = s1.strip()
    s2 = s2.strip()
    if len(s1) == 0 and len(s2) == 0:
        return False
    s1 = s1.lower()
    s2 = s2.lower()
    return s2 in s1

def is_substring(s1, s2):
    s1 = s1.strip()
    s2 = s2.strip()
    if len(s1) == 0 or len(s2) == 0:
        return False
    s1 = s1.lower()
    s2 = s2.lower()
    return s2 not in s1
